articles.author: Zach Osterman
articles.title: Indiana basketball's new coach was also a March Madness snub, and is a consistent winner - IndyStar
articles.description: The Hoosiers hired Darian DeVries, a consistent winner at Drake, after he spent one season coaching West Virginia, also a NCAA Tournament snub like IU.
articles.content:
• The 31st Indiana men's basketball coach comes from the high-major level, the first time IU has done that since 2009.
  • The new coach is a consistent winner looking to restore such tradi… [+2543 chars]
